name: dueling kingdom
description:
Play with many different heroes in a world full of dangers. Every hero has unique abilities which you can use to destroy enemies and bosses. This game is optimized for two players, but you can play it alone too. The game can be played in two different ways. The first mode- adventure mode - can be played by one or two against the bad guys.  the next mode called duels you fight against your friends.

There is content for about an hour.

this is my first game and i created it in one year, i hope you will like it :)
